entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:36 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 7:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: SW 37 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening with 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
